      Methods in moulton.scalable.texts with parameters of type ScrollBar 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void TextHistory.setScrollBar​(ScrollBar bar)
      Sets the scroll bar so the text history can show more than just recent messages.
      void TextBox.setTextScroller​(ScrollBar textScroller)
      Sets the scroll bar that will be used to view text hidden in virtual space if such is allowed by TextBox.virtualSpace.
